channel.title: [317]Tele Help[/317] [++rep 4 help]
channel.description:
I want to make an npc give options to tele.
Talk to him and he says "Where would you like to go?" "GWD" "home" "train"
When I click on home i wanna tele home.. I can add the tele coords in. I just dont know how to do it so an npc gives options.

item.title: [317]Tele Help[/317] [++rep 4 help]
item.dc:creator: @ImNoHacker ImNoHacker
item.description:
@ImNoHacker wrote:

I want to make an npc give options to tele.

Talk to him and he says
“Where would you like to go?”
“GWD”
“home”
“train”

When I click on home i wanna tele home… I can add the tele coords in. I just dont know how to do it so an npc gives options.
